property.value: U.S. soldier handing out medical supplies

note.text: When working with local counterparts, itâ€™s important to avoid making any promises. Verbal agreements are taken very seriously, so do not suggest that you will do something that you may not be able to accomplish. If you are not able to deliver something that your counterparts believe you promised, they may be less willing to trust you in the future. In most cases, it's good practice to under promise and over deliver.
